categoryDefinitions.$description: These categories are applied to nodes in the ROS1 Bridge
categoryDefinitions.isaacRos: Nodes implementing functionality for ROS1 Interoperability
categoryDefinitions.isaacRos:publisher: Nodes that publish a ROS1 message
categoryDefinitions.isaacRos:subscriber: Nodes that subscribe to a ROS1 message
categoryDefinitions.isaacRos:service: Nodes that provide rosservice in ROS1
